segments.text: I see the cookie jar is full, and the boy is determined to get some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so excited, reaching out with her hand like she’s begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both having fun, even if it’s a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse, but they don’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that same plate, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how focused the girl is on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, but he’s not giving up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it’s getting closer to the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they’re careful, but I doubt they will be.
segments.speaker: PAR
